General.Name: Clean Vision Corp
General.Description: Clean Vision Corporation operates in clean energy and waste to energy industries. It focuses on the provision of solution to the plastic waste problem by recycling the waste and converting it into saleable byproducts, such as hydrogen and other clean-burning fuels that can be used to generate clean energy. The company is headquartered in Manhattan Beach, California.
General.Address: 2711 N. Sepulveda Boulevard, Manhattan Beach, CA, United States, 90266-2725

1.Name: Ms. Rachel  Boulds C.P.A., CPA, PLLC
